title: New: Abstract Cannon – Early Morning Intervention
body:
Photo by [Tommy Petroni](http://www.flickr.com/photos/tommypetroni/)

When it comes to bit sized slices of expression, [Abstract Cannon](http://abstractcannon.bandcamp.com/) is a good place to start. 2 minutes of raw as shit flows, zoned out beats and anger; all however, with just the right amount of humanity.

_Early Morning Intervention_ is taken from the _**[Foam Mountains Mixtape.](http://abstractcannon.bandcamp.com/album/foam-mountains)**_

Check out [Abstract Cannon at SXSW](https://www.facebook.com/events/356700034370389/) on March 16.
